title: Respect
lyrics:
[intro, kazoo] (A7)  (D7)
 
(E7)(Ooh)  What you want?
(D7)(Ooh)  Baby, I got
(E7)(Ooh)  What you need?
(D7)(Ooh)  Do you know I've got it?
(E7)(Ooh)  All I'm asking
(D7)(Ooh) Is… for a little re(A7)spect when you come home (Just a little bit) 
Hey (D7)baby (Just a little bit)
When you get home (A7) (Just a little bit) 
Mis(D7)ter (Just a little bit) 
 
(E7) I ain't gonna do you wrong
(D7) While you're gone
(E7) Ain't gonna do you wrong
(D7)(Ooh) 'Cause I don't want to
(E7)(Ooh)  All I'm asking
(D7)(Ooh) Is… for a little re(A7)spect when you come home (Just a little bit) 
Baa(D7)aby (Just a little bit)
When you get home (A7) (Just a little bit) 
Yeah (D7) (Just a little bit) 
 
(E7) I'm about to give you
(D7) All of my money
(E7) And all I'm asking
(D7) In return, honey
(E7) Is to give me
(D7) My profits
When you get (A7)home (Just a, just a, just a, just a)
Yeah (D7)baby (Just a, just a, just a, just a)
When you get (A7)home (Just a little bit)
Yeah (D7) (Just a little bit) 
[interlude, kazoo] (Ebm)  (G#)  (Ebm)  (E7)    
 
(E7)Ooh, your kisses          
(D7)(Ooh)  Sweeter than honey
(E7)(Ooh)  And guess what
(D7)(Ooh)  So is my money
(E7)(Ooh)  All I want you to
(D7)(Ooh) Do for me
Is give it to me (A7)when you get home (Re, re, re ,re)
Yeah (D7)baby (Re, re, re ,re)
Whip it to me (Re(A7)spect, just a little bit)
When you get home (D7) (Just a little bit)
 
[Bridge, single strum]
(A7)R-E-S-P-E-C-T
(D7)Find out what it means to me
(A7)R-E-S-P-E-C-T
(D7) Take care, TCB
 
(A7)Oh (Sock it to me, sock it to me, sock it to me)
A little re(D7)spect (Sock it to me, sock it to me, sock it to me)
Whoa babe (A7) (Just a little bit)
A little re(D7)spect (Just a little bit)
I get (A7)tired (Just a little bit)
Keep on (D7)trying (Just a little bit)
Re(A7)spect (Re, re, re ,re)
When you get home (D7) (Re, re, re ,re)
Re(A7)spect [end]
